    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="ca">Être européen au XXIème siècle</string>
            <string language="en">Being a European in the 21st centrury</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Europäer im 21. centrury sein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étant un Européen dans le 21ème centrury</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sendo um europeu no 21o centrury</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Essendo un europeo nel ventunesimo centrury</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Όντας ο Ευρωπαίος 21$ο στον centrury</string>
          </title>
          <language>fr</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pàgina web dels alumnes de francès de l'IES Vidreres. Conté una presentació de França, Europa i Catalunya amb diferents enllaços.</string>
            <string language="en">Webpage by French students at Vidreres Secondary School. It includes a presentation of France, Europe and Catalonia, as well as different links.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">activitats extraescolars</string>
            <string language="en">extracurricular activities</string>
            <string language="es">actividades extraescolares</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengües</string>
            <string language="en">languages</string>
            <string language="es">lenguas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història moderna</string>
            <string language="en">modern history</string>
            <string language="es">historia moderna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">material multimèdia</string>
            <string language="en">multimedia material</string>
            <string language="es">material multimedia</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Webseite durch French Kursteilnehmer Vidreres an 
der Sekundärschule. Sie schließt eine Darstellung von 
Frankreich, von Europa und von Katalonien, sowie unterschiedliche 
Links ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Page Web par des étudiants de French à 
l'école secondaire de Vidreres. Elle inclut une présentation 
de la France, de l'Europe et de la Catalogne, aussi bien que 
différents liens.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web page por estudantes de Francês na escola 
secundária de Vidreres. Inclui uma apresentação de France, de
Europa e de Catalonia, as.well.as as ligações diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Web page dagli allievi del French alla scuola 
secondaria di Vidreres. Include una presentazione della Francia,
di Europa e della Catalogna, così come i collegamenti differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Webpage από τους γαλλικούς σπουδαστές vidreres 
στη δευτεροβάθμια εκπαίδευση. Περιλαμβάνει μια παρουσίαση 
της Γαλλίας, της Ευρώπης και της Καταλωνίας, καθώς επίσης και των
διαφορετικών συνδέσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">extrakurrikulare Aktivitäten</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
